V

ValidateEmail(String) - Method in class pure.bank.User
This method is used to validate a valid email address
Regex: ^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Za-z]{2,6}$
validatePassword(String, String) - Method in class pure.bank.User
This method is used to validate the password
The UID will be used to get the password and salt from the database
The password will be hashed using BCrypt and salted with the salt from the database
ValidatePhone(String) - Method in class pure.bank.User
This method is used to validate the phone number
The phone number must be 8 digits long (Singapore phone number)
The phone number must be numbers only or 0
Regex: ^([8-9][0-9]{7}|0)$
ValidatePin(String) - Method in class pure.bank.User
This method is used to validate the pin must be 6 digits long, and must be numbers only
Regex: [0-9]+
ValidateUserName(String) - Method in class pure.bank.User
This method is used to validate the username must be alphanumeric and less than 10 characters
The username must not already exist in the database
Used during user creation
Regex: [a-zA-Z0-9]+
validEmail(String) - Static method in class pure.util.InputSanitisation
Checks if the input is a valid email
This is to prevent SQL injection
validNameString(String) - Static method in class pure.util.InputSanitisation
Checks if the input is a valid name
This is to prevent SQL injection
validPhone(String) - Static method in class pure.util.InputSanitisation
Checks if the input is a valid Singapore phone number
This is to prevent SQL injection
validPin(String) - Static method in class pure.util.InputSanitisation
Checks if the input is a valid Pin
This is to prevent SQL injection
